column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=DS : What about sugar ethanol ?
#Text=SB : Sure .
#Text=Sugarcane ethanol ?
#Text=DS : Do you think we should lower tariffs on sugar in order to be able to import more Brazilian sugar ethanol ?
#Text=SB : You 're gonna kill the ethanol industry here just as it gets going .
#Text=DS : But it would reduce our dependency on foreign oil , thus increasing our national security , would n't it ?
#Text=Or is the ethanol industry here more important ?
#Text=SB : Well , I think on the equation you 're talking about , I think getting the ethanol industry here going -- and particularly on cellulosic ethanol .
#Text=And that 's our big play to make here ; we 're --
#Text=DS : But the energy that you derive from that is so much less than it is in sugar ethanol .
#Text=SB : I don't -- you may be right on that .

#Text=I 've not looked at that energy ratio , but -- it 's a sound environmental way to go , on cellulosic ethanol , and that 's , I think , the big play we need to be making and pushing aggressively towards in this country for energy independence and good environmentalism .

#Text=I 'm the lead Republican on a bipartisan bill that pushes this concept , and a big piece of it is getting plug-in cars on the marketplace than can do the first twenty or thirty miles off of electricity instead of either gasoline or ethanol , because half of the country does n't drive over twenty or thirty miles a day .
#Text=And that way , you can really drop your imported oil use quickly ; it 's good for the environment , too .
#Text=On Wikipedia
#Text=DS : Senator , do you think that Wikipedia is important ?
#Text=SB : Yes , a lot of people use it to get a quick kind of reference point review of a lot of different topics , including politics .
#Text=And political figures .
#Text=DS : Definitely .
#Text=What do you find important about it ?
#Text=SB : Just that .
#Text=I mean , it 's an easy access ; it can be amended .

#Text=I 've not used it , but I 've been with other people that have accessed it and know a lot of people that all say , " Yeah , I looked it up on Wikipedia , " so I know it 's broadly and widely used .

#Text=DS : I tried to get an interview with David Miscavige of the Church of Scientology , and I spoke to their Director of Public Relations ; I had about a twenty-minute phone call with him , and he was very hostile to it .

#Text=One of the things that I 'd said to him -- because he was saying that a lot of information is incorrect -- I made the point to him that , " You know , it may be incorrect , but the idea is that you can have Scientologists go on there to correct it .

#Text= It 's not a one-sided place for information ; if you feel that there 's inaccuracies , the idea is that you can also have people who know the truth go on there and correct it and debate about it , if that is what is necessary to get an accurate view .
